short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts product info like name, image, price, brand, and description from Tesco pages and shows it in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tesco Product Info Extractor is a simple Chrome extension designed to make your online shopping experience easier. With this extension, you can extract key product information from Tesco grocery pages, including product name, image, price, brand, description, and more. The extracted data is conveniently displayed in a popup, saving you time and effort when browsing Tesco's website. Whether you're comparing prices, researching products, or tracking specific product details, this tool will streamline the process and make it more efficient. It's perfect for shoppers, deal finders, and anyone who frequently uses Tesco's online grocery platform.
